definition: escaped criminal/fugitive from the law (criminal suspect on the run)
to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)

sentences.english: The escaped prisoner was dragged from his hiding-place.
sentences.chinese: 那逃犯從他隱藏的地方被拖了出來。

sentences.english: The escaped prisoner was dragged out of his hiding-place.
sentences.chinese: 逃犯從他躲藏的地方給拉了出來。

sentences.english: The customs officers seized the smuggled heroin.
sentences.chinese: 警察抓住了一個在逃犯。

sentences.english: The police seized an escaping convict.
sentences.chinese: 警察抓住了一個在逃犯。

sentences.english: The fugitive lived in a cave in the mountain crag for several years.
sentences.chinese: 這個逃犯在一個山上峭壁的巖洞裏住了幾年。

sentences.english: The policemen in the forest are looking out for escaped prisoners.
sentences.chinese: 警察正在森林裏搜尋逃犯。

sentences.english: Hundreds of those convicts remain at large.
sentences.chinese: 數以百計的逃犯仍逍遙法外。

sentences.english: The escaped prisoner beat about for some place to hide.
sentences.chinese: 逃犯倉惶尋找個藏身之處。

sentences.english: The police are beating the town for the escapee.
sentences.chinese: 警方正在鎮上搜捕那個逃犯。

sentences.english: The escaped convict was seized outside the city.
On the cape the scraped escapee taped the grapes into various shapes.
sentences.chinese: 在海角上，擦傷的逃犯用帶子把葡萄紮成各種形狀。

sentences.english: The  escaped prisoner is still at large.
One who pursues a criminal or fugitive for whom a reward is offered.
sentences.chinese: 爲得賞而追捕緝拿罪犯或逃犯的人。

sentences.english: That escaped convict was brought to bay.
sentences.chinese: 那個逃犯被帶到海灣去了。

sentences.english: Would you take millions if you had to live as a fugitive?
sentences.chinese: 如果讓你以逃犯的身份生活，你會拿走數百萬嗎？

definition: to be at large (of a criminal)
(of a bird, fish etc) to be caught in a net/(of a tennis ball) to hit the net/(of a criminal) to be captured
to pursue/to be after/to hunt down
to order the arrest of sb as criminal/to list as wanted
to investigate (as detective)/to solve (crime)/to uncover (a plot)/to sniff out/to break in and analyze/detective work/to scout
to bring to justice/to file away (a document)
